articles.author: Mike Barnes
articles.title: Floyd Roger Myers Jr., ‘Fresh Prince of Bel-Air’ Actor, Dies at 42 - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: He also portrayed a young Marlon Jackson on the ABC miniseries ‘The Jacksons: An American Dream.’
articles.content: Floyd Roger Myers Jr., who played younger versions of Will Smith and Marlon Jackson, respectively, on episodes of The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air and The Jacksons: An American Dream, has died. He was 42.… [+1464 chars]
